creator: Standard Applications
descriptionHtml:
Weather score is an easy to use apps for getting your daily weather updates, weather forecast and world weather. Now you can easily get your local weather with free weather app. Hourly and daily updates are given to the user according to his local weather with forecast and temperature. Weather radar and weather maps help you with condition of world weather live. Use chart to find out from weather maps and weather radars the exact weather conditions like precipitation, temperature and clouds. Weather channeling to get you the exact weather updates and weather reports. Free weather app allows you to get detailed weather reports offline as well (Once you have updated the weather). Very easy to change location of the weather app from local weather to the world weather.
Following are the features of the application:

i) Live Weather updates: Now you can get local weather temperature, location, description of the weather from weather score: live radar and weather app.
ii) Weather Forecast: Weather forecast provided will be in hours and days. 5 days forecast is provided by the app for the user. For more details click on the weather day.
iii) Live Weather Maps: Weather maps will let you know the range of temperature, precipitation and clouds world weather maps.

Download and enjoy the fast, efficient Weather Score: Live Radar and Weather Map.
descriptionShort: Get local weather updates, forecasts and offline weather with free weather app
